ingredients: 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 3 tablespoons olive oil, 1 clove garlic, minced,   +   1/2 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes,   salt and pepper to taste, 1 pound boneless pork loin, cut into 1 inch cubes, 1 (14.5 ounce) can low-sodium beef broth, 2 tablespoons cornstarch, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 2 cloves garlic, minced,   +   1/4 teaspoon ground ginger, 3  portobello mushrooms, cut into quarters, 1 large red onion, cut into 12 wedges, 12  cherry tomatoes, 12 bite-size chunks fresh pineapple
